CustomField.description: This field is used to specify a comma separated list of extensions which can be uploaded. For example: TXT, BMP, JPEG, PNG, PDF, XLS, DOC, DOCX, XLSX, JPG, MSG, PPT, PPTX, GIF, SVG, EPS, CDR, ZIP
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to specify a comma separated list of extensions which can be uploaded. For example: TXT, BMP, JPEG, PNG, PDF, XLS, DOC, DOCX, XLSX, JPG, MSG, PPT, PPTX, GIF, SVG, EPS, CDR, ZIP
CustomField.label: Allowed Extensions
